def_cn: （攻击、事故、伤势等）令人震惊的，极其可怕的，十分严重的
def_en: If you describe a physical attack, accident, or injury as horrific, you mean that it is very bad, so that people are shocked when they see it or think about it.
If you describe something as horrific, you mean that it is so big that it is extremely unpleasant.
